EntryName	FGD4_HUMAN
ProteinName	FYVE, RhoGEF and PH domain-containing protein 4 (Actin filament-binding protein frabin) (FGD1-related F-actin-binding protein) (Zinc finger FYVE domain-containing protein 6)
GeneName	FGD4 FRABP ZFYVE6
Length	188
Function	Activates CDC42, a member of the Ras-like family of Rho- and Rac proteins, by exchanging bound GDP for free GTP. Plays a role in regulating the actin cytoskeleton and cell shape. Activates MAPK8 (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Cytoskeleton; Cell projection; Filopodium
